data.title: Every Square Inch Fitness
data.meta_description: "There is not a square inch in the whole domain of our human existence over which Christ, who is sovereign over all, does not cry: 'Mine!'" -Abraham Kuyper

A Scandalous Manger Scene

They were both rich. One had known and kept all the commandments from his youth. The other made his living off of stealing from his neighbors.
